title: Sonos CEO on Earnings and Adapting to the Pandemic
itunes:title: Sonos CEO on Earnings and Adapting to the Pandemic
description:
Patrick Spence, CEO at Sonos, discusses earnings. He talks about the launch of three new products and how his team has adapted during the pandemic. Spence also points out the company's actions to focus more on online direct-to-consumer sales.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Doni Holloway.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
